{H} []The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less gains [[Anchored]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Character in your Reserve with a card from your hand.
{J} []Exchange target Character in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
{H} []Exchange target Character in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  {R} []Each player may put a card from their hand in Reserve.

{H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.
{J} []Exchange target Character in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: [Sabotage].
